HotelDescriptiveContent.HotelName: JW Marriott Scottsdale Camelback Inn Resort & Spa

HotelName.HotelShortName: JW MARRIOTT CAMELBACK INN RESORT & SPA

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our Scottsdale conference center venues offer 20 meeting rooms ideal for company retreats.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Conference event venues include the 20,000 SF Arizona Ballroom and the 3,621 SF Peace Pipe Ballroom.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Exceptional event catering menus for event planning in Scottsdale, AZ that will delight your guests!

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: 40,000 square feet of flexible meeting room space in a stunning Scottsdale resort setting.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: JW Marriott's certified event planners will help coordinate a flawless business meeting.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Use MeetingMatrix® to download Certified Room Diagrams for JW Marriott's Camelback Inn.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Stay in our Paradise Valley resort's Pueblo-style casitas, offering an oasis of tranquil privacy.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Our Casita’s private patios and balconies open onto breathtaking views of Arizona's Paradise Valley.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Seven of our luxurious Scottsdale hotel's suites feature private swimming pools.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: All rooms feature Marriott's Revive Bedding with down comforters, designer duvets and plush pillows.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: All guest accommodations also feature microwave, mini-fridge and high speed Internet.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Hotel amenities include golf, spa, and pools unrivaled by other luxury resorts in Arizona.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Stay in our Paradise Valley resort's Pueblo-style casitas, offering an oasis of tranquil privacy.
Our Casita’s private patios and balconies open onto breathtaking views of Arizona's Paradise Valley.
Seven of our luxurious Scottsdale hotel's suites feature private swimming pools.
All rooms feature Marriott's Revive Bedding with down comforters, designer duvets and plush pillows.
All guest accommodations also feature microwave, mini-fridge and high speed Internet.
Hotel amenities include golf, spa, and pools unrivaled by other luxury resorts in Arizona.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our Scottsdale wedding venues boast the most highly-sought outdoor wedding locations in Arizona.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: The 3,621 sq. ft. Peace Pipe Ballroom seats up to 240 guests for a memorable Scottsdale reception.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: The Mummy Mountain cowboy cookout area is a unique and fun setting for rehearsal dinners.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Sonoran Terrace offers sweeping desert vistas, perfect for wedding ceremonies and receptions.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Red Coat Service Professionals handle last-minute requests for Scottsdale wedding receptions.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Delightful event menus designed to inspire!

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Experience Thursday Night ArtWalks in Scottsdale’s world renowned and eclectic Art’s District.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: The Desert Botanical Garden features over 50,000 plants in its stunning outdoor exhibits.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: McCormick-Stillman Railroad Park is a unique and fun family attraction, with loads to see and do.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Partake in urban hiking at Camelback Mountain. A landmark icon of Scottsdale, Arizona.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Cosanti in Paradise Valley, Arizona is the residence and sculpture studio of Paolo Soleri.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Our Scottsdale luxury resort fuses a spirit of modern adventure with its storied history - live music, acres of desert gardens, hiking, biking & more.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Challenge yourself at our Scottsdale golf resort's Camelback Golf Club, featuring two championship 18-hole courses. Private lessons are available.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Our Paradise Valley resort has free Wi-Fi in the lobby and gardens so you can stay connected while enjoying views of Camelback and Mummy Mountain

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Vibrant and serene, bold and enchanting. JW Marriott Scottsdale Camelback Inn Resort embraces the future and welcomes the next generation of guests into its harmonious blend of modern luxury and storied history with award-winning Spa, Golf & dining.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Vibrant and serene, bold and enchanting, the JW Marriott Scottsdale Camelback Inn Resort & Spa embraces the future and welcomes the next generation of guests into its harmonious blend of creature comforts with a storied history. Our luxury Scottsdale resort pulses with a spirit of adventure, whether you are playing one of our 2 championship Arizona golf courses; relaxing in our award-winning spa; or enjoying endless outdoor recreation, including swimming, hiking, and biking. Our dramatic 125-acre campus beneath Mummy Mountain features casita rooms brimming with luxurious amenities and an indulgence of fine cuisine at our 6 restaurants, including the famed BLT Steak. Our luxury resort’s high-tech meeting and event rooms, outdoor venues and private dining provide cozy spaces for large groups or intimate soirees. Free high-speed Wi-Fi in public spaces, an outdoor heated pool and complimentary classes in our state-of-the-art fitness center will leave guests with the thinking “In all the world, only one...”

Description.Name: HWS Header Tag
Description.Text: A Bold & Enchanting Luxury Resort In Scottsdale

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Vibrant and serene, bold and enchanting, the JW Marriott Scottsdale Camelback Inn Resort & Spa embraces the future and welcomes the next generation of guests into its harmonious blend of modern luxury and storied history.

Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: A daily resort fee of USD 29 in addition to rate includes bicycle rental, use of driving range, tennis courts and more!

Bathroom Amenities
Description.Text: June Jacobs, soap, shampoo, conditioner, lotion, mouthwash

Description.Name: Number of High Definition (HD) channels available

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy contemporary fine dining in the best steakhouse in Scottsdale, AZ. Celebrity French Chef Laurent Tourondel brings his culinary wizardry to the desert, and the result is not to be missed. Open for dinner only. Reservations recommended.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Warm and inviting, with an ambience of casual, colorful charm, and the patterns and textures of the desert Southwest, elements exceeded only by the delicious dishes of home-style regional cuisine made with the freshest local foods and produce.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The trendy R Bar restaurant and lounge boasts a delectable menu of appetizers, small plates and entrees. Be sure to try our unique, hand-crafted cocktails with herbs from our own spice garden. Live entertainment is featured nightly.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Now open! Acacia is serving American favorites with a twist, in a casual and relaxed atmosphere. Open for breakfast and lunch seven days a week.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located in the Spa and offering a great view to the outdoors, Sprouts features a light and healthy menu. Open to all guests, this peaceful cafe is perfect for a low-key, relaxing meal.

Restaurant.RestaurantName: Hoppin' Jacks at the Jackrabbit Pool

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Handmade pizza, salads, hot and cold specialty sandwiches, burgers and an ice cream bar are among the delicious items available patio or poolside at this delightful café at the Jackrabbit Pool.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Get your espresso fix here! Enjoy refreshing hot and cold beverages made by our expert baristas.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: In a quaint corridor of Arcadia rests Chelsea's Kitchen. Enjoy open architecture with the comfort of ones own kitchen; featuring an excellent patio and bar. Great seafood, salads and tacos - don't miss the Red Velvet Cake!

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Roaring Fork is an American Western Bistro. What is American Western Cuisine? It is a combination of using foods that are indigenous to the American West, locally grown ingredients, and capturing the 'spirit' of the west.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Veneto Trattoria is an independent restaurant modeled after the traditional trattorias of Northern Italy. The authentic menu features fresh, flavorful dishes, all lightly prepared, and are very healthful and satisfying without a heavy, filled feeling.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: At True Food Kitchen, we celebrate simplicity. We practice sustainability. We believe that simple, fresh, pure ingredients create the most memorable and satisfying meals. And while our healthy menu is packed with nutritious food, we never sacrifice flavor

Restaurant.RestaurantName: The Melting Pot a fondue restaurant

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: We are the premier fondue restaurant where guests can enjoy a choice of fondue cooking styles and a variety of unique entrees, salads and indulgent desserts.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy your favorite Italian appetizers, entrees, and desserts.

Description.Name: Is Written Authorization Required for Credit Card Deposits

TaxDescription.Name: Resort Fee Description
TaxDescription.Text: Daily resort fee includes the below amenities: Unlimited local and domestic long distance calls * One complimentary appetizer after 4pm with purchase of item of equal or greater value at BLT Steak House, Rita's Kitchen or R Bar * Complimentary meals for children 12 and under from Rita's Kitchen children's menu-limit two children per adult entree purchase * 15 percent off gift and clothing purchases at gift shops at the resort or spa * Preferred rates and rental discounts at Camelback Golf Club * Complimentary shuttle service to Camelback Golf Club * Complimentary use of tennis courts for two hours * Complimentary two hour bike rental / The resort fee does not apply to groups of 10 or more rooms

Description.Name: Pet Policy Description
Description.Text: 2 pets per room allowed with USD 250 per stay fee and signed pet agreement

Description.Name: Brief Property Location Description
Description.Text: A legendary Scottsdale resort with mountain views and elevated services.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From Airport:Take North 44th Street approximately 9 miles to where it curves into East McDonald Drive. Continue on East McDonald Drive to North Tatum Boulevard and turn left. Follow the boulevard to East Lincoln Drive and turn right. The resort will be on the left.From Rental Car Facilities:Turn Left on Sky Harbor Circle. Right on Buckeye Road. Left on 24th Street. Right on Glendale (becomes Lincoln Dr.) Resort is on the Left just past Tatum Blvd.

Description.Name: Spa marketing description
Description.Text: The Spa at Camelback Inn invites you to simply relax. Relish the moments of balance and tranquility offered in our quiet haven. Discover the magic of the Sonoran Desert while connecting with your inner self.

Description.Name: Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: Exit 51 at Lincoln Drive, go East on Lincoln. The resort will be on the North side of Lincoln.

Description.Name: Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: From I-10: Exit 24th street, head north until dead ends at Lincoln Drive: Turn right on Lincoln; Cross over Tatum Blvd. and resort is 1/4 mile on left.

Description.Name: Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: From I-17 Exit Glendale Avenue and head East. Glendale turns into Lincoln Drive. Cross over Tatum Blvd. and resort is 1/4 mile on left.

Description.Text: The Scottsdale Convention and Visitors Bureau brings everything Scottsdale together in one convenient location.

Description.Name: Partner Description
Description.Text: Downtown Scottsdale offers some of the finest galleries, specialty retail, cultural attractions and dining in the Valley of the Sun.

Description.Name: Partner Description
Description.Text: Arizona's luxury magazine for affluent desert living. Your link to news, information and stories on custom homes, local golf, the latest fashion.

Description.Name: Partner Description
Description.Text: BLT Steak is an interpretation of the American Steakhouse and bistro ambiance. Indulge in our signature warm popovers and specially selected steaks.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: The 30-year tradition of Scottsdale ArtWalk takes place every Thursday evening from 7pm-9pm in along Main Street and Marshall Way in Downtown Scottsdale. The galleries open their doors to the public and show off the work of the Southwest’s outstanding artists.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: An Opportunity To Own A Piece Of Camelback Inn...

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Camelback Inn is now offering the rare opportunity to own part of this beautiful resort and gain incomparable vacation privileges. Enjoy 28 owner-use days of vacation each year at the Camelback Inn and other Marriott, Ritz-Carlton or Renaissance Hotels and Resorts. And that’s just the beginning.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available in the courtyard, R Bar, Living Room (lobby) and Pool.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: R Bar Happy Hour & Live Entertainment

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Summer or not, the R bar has nightly live entertainment and happy hour during the week!

Description.Text: Save up to 35% on room rates over select dates through November 1, 2014 when you reserve your stay by September 18, 2014. Offer valid for stays from September 18 - November 1, 2014. Book online and use promotional code D59 or call 1-800-721-6996 and reference promotional code XXAX. Book now!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Dave McGary’s bronze sculptures are located throughout the grounds of the resort. Considered the Master of Realism depicting Native American Indians, Dave’s ability to capture the human spirit knows no equal. His attention to detail in form and historic content are exhilarating.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Fall For The Caramel Covered Apple Wrap

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Imagine a creamy, delicious caramel apple that doesn’t stick to your teeth. Stop dreaming and start enjoying. This body treatment begins with apple, cinnamon and brown sugar combined with an intoxicating ginger-pecan flavored body scrub. Call the spa to reserve your treatment today 1-800-922-2635.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Cyber Monday Deal: Spa Gift Certificate Sale!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Buy a Spa gift certificate for a Swedish massage valued at $145 for the special Cyber Monday price of $115.Treat your loved ones this Holiday season with a gift that will create memories that will last all year. Buy online or call 1-800-922-2635 for more information. Available 12/1/2014.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Interested in Booking a Golf Tournament or Outing?

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Contact our Golf Sales Coordinator, Michael Bunker, at 480-905-7981 or michael.bunker@marriott.com.

TPA_Ext_eConfo.Title: Don't Miss Our Live Entertainment Nightly

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Join us for nightly live entertainment from 7pm - 11pm on R'bar Patio!

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: JW Marriott Camelback Inn holds a long list of top industry honors recognizing the ultimate standard for meetings. More than 40,000 square feet of space for groups includes an Executive Boardroom, an outdoor Western theme town, and every meeting amenity imaginable. All 453 pueblo-style casitas feature private patios or balconies and an array of stylish luxuries. Twenty-seven suites add living rooms, dining rooms, and sundecks; seven have swimming pools of their own. The Camelback Golf Club promises an exceptional golf experience at the 18-hole Arthur Hills designed Padre Course, a classic layout in a parkland setting of rolling terrain. The Ambiente Course adds another 18-hole challenge marked by secluded sand traps and tree-lined fairways. The 125-acre resort grounds features the Jackrabbit Pool, an aquatic complex with a children’s play area, workout facilities, and Hoppin’ Jack’s—plus miles of strolling, jogging, and bicycling paths. The world renown 32,000-square-foot Spa at Camelback Inn offers 32 treatment rooms, a full-service gym, lap pool, salon, and a wide array of rejuvenation and pampering services. Set apart from the rest of the Inn, the spa’s location next to Mummy Mountain ensures a tranquil haven. Sprouts, the spa’s restaurant, attracts guests from all over the resort with its fresh, heart-healthy menus. For the ultimate in dining, few can resist the amazing food and breathtaking views in BLT Steak and Rita’s Kitchen.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: $50M renovation completed in Fall of 2008 including new ballroom space, rooms renovation and dining options. Mid size upscale award-winning resort ideal for 10-400 peak room groups. Most immediate competitors are more city style or high rise larger properties. Ideal business is a combination of group and leisure. Group should make up 60% of the inventory, while leisure should be the remainder. Group mix is a combination of corporate, association, and affinity. Ideal group size is 150 peak rooms although 10-400 peak rooms works extremely well based on space configuration and property size. Sun-Wednesday would be the preferred pattern, although Wed-Fri and Thu-Sun work well also. Need times are Holidays and Summer where much more flexibility is shown in rate and concessions.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: An enchanting haven of award-wnning hospitality and Southwestern charm is yours to rediscover: the hacienda-style entry and lobby, spectacular new restaurants, grand courtyard and the all new 20,000 square foot Arizona Ballroom await.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: $50M renovation and repositioning completed in Fall of 2008. Renovation included guest rooms soft goods, new Arizona Ballroom of 20,000 sf, main Lodge renovation including new dining and entertainment options.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Experience the best Scottsdale has to offer! We are five minutes from the shops, museums and restaurants of enchanting Old Town Scottsdale and only fifteen minutes from excitement of downtown Phoenix.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: Season destination with peak falling between January and April, shoulder between May and June, summer (complete off season) between July and September, shoulder again between September and December

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: Camelback Inn is a meeting planner's oasis in the desert. It is the ideal destination to promote productivity as well as reward meeting attendees. Our cactus-studded Sonoran Desert provides the perfect tranquil setting while our well-quipped meeting rooms

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Primary season due to weather. Highs hover in the mid 70's with an overnight low of high 40's. Outstanding time for outdoor activities and functions. Also falls during spring training.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Weather remains a strong factor over this time as it is still moderate, yet pricing is more palatable for many organizations that cannot afford the peak season pricing.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Although the temperatures can be a factor during this time, there are incredible values to be had as pricing can fall between $109-$149 compared to peak season pricing of around $275 - $300.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: This is another great weather season, yet priced slightly lower than peak.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The $10 million Ambiente golf course establishes a one-of-a-kind Southwest golf destination. The course presents a distinct challenge where accuracy and a good strategy command the day, as every hole will force even the best players to focus on each shot.

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: Located a short three miles from the resort (shuttle provided), Camelback Golf Club, one of Arizona's original gems, features 36 holes of championship golf located in beautiful Scottsdale, Arizona. Inquire about our Jr. Summer Golf Camp at (480) 905-7902!

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: A true desert golf experience with two, 18-hole golf courses

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Disfrute de un escape relajante cuando se hospeda en el lujoso JW Marriott Scottsdale Camelback Inn Resort & Spa. Nuestro impresionante resort en Scottsdale ofrece fácil acceso a una variedad de renombradas atracciones que incluye el Jardín Botánico del Desierto y una gran selección de galerías de arte y restaurantes. Para el viajero al que le gusta explorar la naturaleza, nuestro hotel está cerca de varias actividades al aire libre como escalada en roca y ciclismo de montaña. El aeropuerto de Phoenix queda a 15 kilómetros de la propiedad, y el aeropuerto de Scottsdale queda a 19. Las habitaciones de nuestro resort de lujo en Scottsdale ofrecen elegante estilo y comodidades innovadoras como Internet de alta velocidad y televisores LCD con CNN, ESPN y HBO. Trabajar fuera de la oficina es fácil con espaciosos escritorios, sillas cómodas y amplia iluminación. Cada habitación también ofrece suntuosa ropa de cama, mini-refrigerador y servicio de café y té. Para espacio adicional, elija una de nuestras exclusivas suites. A diferencia de otros hoteles en Scottsdale, Arizona, nuestro JW Marriott cuenta con siete famosos restaurantes. Disfrute de filetes, mariscos, pizza, sándwiches, hamburguesas y más sin tener que salir de la propiedad. Único entre hoteles en Arizona, el Camelback Resort en Scottsdale tiene un campo de golf y lujoso spa que ofrece masajes, tratamientos faciales, manicuras, pedicuras, baños terapéuticos y más. Si está planificando un evento social o corporativo en Scottsdale, Arizona, no hay mejor opción que nuestro JW Marriott, que cuenta con 3.700 metros cuadrados de espacio para bodas, banquetes, recepciones, eventos de caridad, conferencias y reuniones. Comuníquese con nuestros planificadores profesionales hoy para empezar a organizar su evento. Para una estadía lujosa, relajante y refrescante en la encantadora ciudad de Scottsdale, haga su reserva en el extraordinario JW Marriott Scottsdale Camelback Inn Resort.

TPA_Ext_InLang_MessageType.Title: El Camelback Resort en Scottsdale ofrece elegantes habitaciones, campo de golf, lujoso spa, siete restaurantes y 20 impresionantes salas de eventos.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: El impresionante JW Marriott Scottsdale Camelback Inn Resort & Spa ofrece elegantes habitaciones, comodidades lujosas y excelente servicio. Nuestro resort de lujo en Scottsdale ofrece fácil acceso al Jardín Botánico del Desierto, los aeropuertos de Phoenix y Scottsdale y una gran selección de restaurantes, bares y galerías de arte. Las habitaciones de nuestro resort en Scottsdale ofrecen elegante estilo y comodidades modernas como Internet de alta velocidad y televisores LCD. Cada habitación también cuenta con suntuosa ropa de cama, mini-refrigerador y caja de seguridad. A diferencia de otros hoteles en Scottsdale, Arizona, el Camelback Resort en Scottsdale ofrece un campo de golf, spa, siete restaurantes y 3.700 metros cuadrados de espacio para eventos. Disfrute de una estadía refrescante y relajante – haga su reserva en el JW Marriott Scottsdale Camelback Inn Resort & Spa.
